definition: abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels

sentences.english: This construction has survived the Crimean War and the WWII.
sentences.chinese: 這幢建築在克里米亞戰爭和二戰中得以倖存。

sentences.english: Perestroyka Hall is the largest cave in the Crimea.
sentences.chinese: 改革大堂是克里米亞最大的洞穴。

sentences.english: Ukraine, Crimea, Black sea, view from Ai-Petri mountain.
sentences.chinese: 烏克蘭，克里米亞，黑海，從愛的Petri山景。

sentences.english: Thee Duke was in the Army and served in the Crimean War.
sentences.chinese: 這位公爵是位軍人，還參加過克里米亞戰爭。

sentences.english: Why doesn'tthe US and Europe try tofree Crimea or Eastern Ukraine?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼歐美沒有試着解放克里米亞和烏克蘭東部？

sentences.english: Why go there if they have beautiful Crimea.
sentences.chinese: 如果他們有美麗的克里米亞爲什麼還要去那裏。

sentences.english: Autumnwaterfall in the forest of Crimea.
sentences.chinese: 克里米亞，金秋時節森林中的瀑布。

sentences.english: The Duke was in the Army and served in the Crimean War.
sentences.chinese: 這位公爵是位軍人，還參加過克里米亞戰爭。

sentences.english: Many nations have condemned Russia's takeover of Crimea.
sentences.chinese: 許多國家曾譴責俄羅斯佔領克里米亞這一行動。

definition: François Hollande (1954-), French Socialist politician, president of France 2012-2017

pinyin: Ji2 er3 ji2 si1 si1 tan3
